 Standard video/audio codec NFO nothing in the NFO tells you that this file is NOT THE SEQUEL and that it is just all the episodes from the TV SHOW mashed into one file.

Calm down, guys. :-) I got only this as information in other sites, but there is any list of episodes included; as each episode has 20m and this release has 1h26m, only a few episodes were compilated, not all!

Plot: After Hiccup and his Night Fury companion, Toothless, saved the people of Berk by defeating the Red Death, they inspired the Vikings of Berk to make peace with the dragons. However, Hiccup learns that the co-habitation is far from harmonious with Viking ignorance and the Dragons’ instincts threatening to destroy the alliance. To solve the problem, Hiccup’s father, Stoick the Vast, organizes the Berk Dragon Academy where his son and friends can learn all about Dragons. Even as grumpy doubters like Mildew and villains like Alvin the Treacherous oppose them, the Viking teens of Berk and their dragons dedicate themselves to achieving a vital understanding.

Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy
IMDB Rating: 8.2/10 from 487 users
Directed by: John Sanford
Starring: Jay Baruchel, Chris Edgerly and America Ferrera
Release Name: Riders.Of.Berk.2012.DVDRip.XviD.AC3-UnKnOwN
Size: 1.2 GB
Video: AVI | 700×386 | 1780 kbps
Audio: English | AC3 | 448 kbps
Runtime: 1h 26mn

Firstly, this isn't a movie, so it's been uploaded to the wrong section. A simple IMDB number paste when you upload is always helpful, rather than an image link to a text NFO buried among various other image links.

Anyway, the TV series just finished airing, so you can get the whole first season, rather than just the four episodes here. The series is in keeping with the feel of the original.
